entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:11 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 10:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the evening then to rain before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
